disclaimer:
The Sensation and Desire experience is intended only for mature audiences.

The content herein contains graphic depictions of disturbing, violent, and sexual acts.

By entering, you affirm that you are at least 18 years of age, or the age of majority in the jurisdiction you are accessing the website from, and you consent to viewing explicit content.
acknowledgements:
Thank you Ash, for pushing me to grow, and for always coming with.

Thank you Rosco, for being there on the other side, and for challenging me to keep going.

Thank you Chloe, for being the first to engage with the entire experience.

NOTE: Some of the code used to build the Sensation and Desire website was researched using the Google AI Overviews feature.
mtcbrrAbout:
Moontide Crossbridge Revelry is a work of fiction.
The author does not intend for any of the events herein to bear any resemblance to actual events, locales, or persons, either living or dead.

Moontide Crossbridge Revelry is a novel, not a serialized work.
The author will do their best to publish linear updates, but cannot make any guarantees.

Moontide Crossbridge Revelry is currently a rough draft.
Some portions will read rougher than others. Readers will notice discrepancies. The author is developing their process.
